ValidationRule.description: Decline reason is required, if final judgement is Declined or Cancelled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Credit_Assessment_Decline_Reason__c , ''), OR( ISPICKVAL( Final_Judgement__c , 'Declined'), ISPICKVAL( Final_Judgement__c , 'Cancelled') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify decline reason, if final judgement is Declined or cancelled.
